OK, now what do I mean by that? I mean that you can take DNA

with a certain probability all

And so there's ways to

events. OK, and this,
we called, a corrective evolutionary distance then.

And what you will note is that
the corrected evolutionary distance is invariably larger
than the actual observed one.

Now, what can we can do with

best fit tree of relationships.

coli cells, and the E.
